org.jbei.ice.lib.bulkupload

Class BulkUploadController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbei.ice.lib.bulkupload.BulkUploadController

  • public class BulkUploadController
extends Object
    Controller for dealing with bulk imports (including drafts)
    Author:
    Hector Plahar

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public BulkUploadInfo create(String userId,
                    BulkUploadInfo info)

      • retrievePendingImports

        public ArrayList<BulkUploadInfo> retrievePendingImports(Account account)
                                                 throws ControllerException
        Retrieves list of bulk imports that are owned by the system. System ownership is assigned to all bulk imports that are submitted by non-admins and indicates that it is pending approval.

        Administrative privileges are required for making this call

        Parameters:
        account - account for user making call. expected to be an administrator
        Returns:
        list of bulk imports pending verification
        Throws:
        ControllerException

      • retrieveById

        public BulkUploadInfo retrieveById(String userId,
                          long id,
                          int start,
                          int limit)
                            throws ControllerException,
                                   PermissionException
        Retrieves bulk import and entries associated with it that are referenced by the id in the parameter. Only owners or administrators are allowed to retrieve bulk imports
        Parameters:
        userId - identifier for account of user requesting
        id - unique identifier for bulk import
        Returns:
        data transfer object with the retrieved bulk import data and associated entries
        Throws:
        ControllerException
        PermissionException

      • getBulkImport

        public BulkUploadInfo getBulkImport(String userId,
                           long id,
                           int offset,
                           int limit)

      • convertParts

        protected ArrayList<PartData> convertParts(Account account,
                               ArrayList<Entry> contents)
                                    throws ControllerException
        Throws:
        ControllerException

      • getPartsForBulkEdit

        public BulkUploadInfo getPartsForBulkEdit(Account account,
                                 ArrayList<Long> partIds)
                                   throws ControllerException
        Retrieves list of parts that are intended to be edited in bulk. User must have write permissions on all parts
        Parameters:
        account - user account making request. Should have write permissions on all accounts
        partIds - unique part identifiers
        Returns:
        list of retrieved part data wrapped in the bulk upload data transfer object
        Throws:
        ControllerException

      • retrieveSampleStorage

        protected SampleStorage retrieveSampleStorage(Entry entry)

      • retrieveByUser

        public ArrayList<BulkUploadInfo> retrieveByUser(Account account,
                                       Account userAccount)
                                         throws ControllerException
        Retrieves list of user saved bulk imports
        Parameters:
        account - account of requesting user
        userAccount - account whose saved drafts are being requested
        Returns:
        list of draft infos representing saved drafts.
        Throws:
        ControllerException

      • deleteDraftById

        public BulkUploadInfo deleteDraftById(Account requesting,
                             long draftId)
                               throws ControllerException,
                                      PermissionException
        Deletes a bulk import draft referenced by a unique identifier. only owners of the bulk import or administrators are permitted to delete bulk imports
        Parameters:
        requesting - account of user making the request
        draftId - unique identifier for bulk import
        Returns:
        deleted bulk import
        Throws:
        ControllerException
        PermissionException

                                        EntryType addType)
                                          throws ControllerException
        Throws:
        ControllerException

      • submitBulkImportDraft

        public boolean submitBulkImportDraft(Account account,
                            long draftId,
                            ArrayList<UserGroup> readGroups)
                              throws ControllerException,
                                     PermissionException
        Submits a bulk import that has been saved. This action is restricted to the owner of the draft or to administrators.
        Parameters:
        account - Account of user performing save
        draftId - unique identifier for saved bulk import
        Returns:
        true, if draft was sa
        Throws:
        ControllerException
        PermissionException
